name: Cheongmyeong
description: Cheongmyeong is the main protagonist of 'Return of the Blossoming Blade' (also known as 'Return of the Mount Hua Sect'). As the last disciple of the once-great Mount Hua Sect, he returns to the world after being reincarnated 100 years after his death to restore his sect to its former glory. Known as the Plum Blossom Sword Saint in his previous life, he combines unparalleled swordsmanship with a mischievous personality.
analysis: Cheongmyeong represents the perfect blend of genius and hard work. Despite his often playful and seemingly arrogant demeanor, he harbors a deep sense of responsibility toward reviving the Mount Hua Sect. His character journey showcases themes of legacy, redemption, and the burden of expectations. What makes him particularly compelling is the contrast between his carefree attitude and the serious weight of his mission. His growth throughout the series demonstrates how he balances honoring tradition while forging his own path forward.
funFacts: Was known as the Plum Blossom Sword Saint in his previous life
Reincarnated 100 years after his death to restore the Mount Hua Sect
Has a signature plum blossom sword technique
Often pretends to be weaker than he actually is
Has a fondness for alcohol and gambling
Known for his witty remarks and trolling his opponents
His hair color changed from black to white after his reincarnation
